SamPy.db.sqlite.SSFR¶

SamPy.db.sqlite.SSFR(mstardot, mstar)¶

Calculates the specific star formation rate from a given (SAM) data.

Note :

This function can be passed on to slite3 connection
Parameters:
  • mstardot (float or ndarray) – star formation rate
  • mstar (float or ndarray) – stellar mass in
Returns:

specific star formation rate in

Return type:

float or ndarray
